Items.Name: New
Items.Tooltip: Remove all objects from the scene.

Items.Name: Open files
Items.Caption: Open Files
Items.Tooltip: Select files from the dialog and open them in the viewer window.

Items.Name: Open directory
Items.Caption: Open Directory
Items.Tooltip: Load all supported files from given directory and subdirectories.

Items.Name: Open DICOMs
Items.Tooltip: Load all DICOM volumes from a given directory and its subdirectories.

Items.Name: Open RAW Voxels
Items.Tooltip: Load *.raw file with user-specified parameters.

Items.Name: Binary Operations
Items.Tooltip: Various bivariate functions on individual voxel pairs: Union, Intersection, Difference, Max, Min, Sum, Multiply, Divide, Replace.

Items.Name: Open Voxels From TIFF
Items.Tooltip: Load voxels from a set of TIFF images

Items.Name: Save object
Items.Caption: Export
Items.Tooltip: Save selected objects to files.

Items.Name: Save selected
Items.Caption: Save Selected
Items.Tooltip: Save scene tree branches with selected objects to MRU format.

Items.Name: Save Scene
Items.Tooltip: Save MRU scene to the file from which it was opened.

Items.Name: Save Scene As
Items.Tooltip: Saves scene in a file.

Items.Name: Capture screenshot
Items.Caption: Screenshot
Items.Tooltip: Saves screenshot of the scene to file.

Items.Name: Capture UI screenshot
Items.Caption: Save Screenshot
Items.Tooltip: Saves a screenshot of the current view to file.

Items.Name: Screenshot to clipboard
Items.Caption: Screenshot to Clipboard
Items.Tooltip: Copies screenshot of the scene to clipboard

Items.Name: Fit data
Items.Caption: Fit Data
Items.Tooltip: Changes current viewport settings to fit all visible objects in the scene.

Items.Name: Fit selected objects
Items.Caption: Fit Selected Objects
Items.Tooltip: Changes current viewport settings to fit selected visible objects in scene.

Items.Name: Fit selected primitives
Items.Caption: Fit Selected Primitives
Items.Tooltip: Changes current viewport settings to fit selection.

Items.Name: Camera
Items.Tooltip: Manually set camera.

Items.Name: Front View
Items.Tooltip: A view of XZ plane with camera looking along Y.

Items.Name: Top View
Items.Tooltip: A view of XY plane with Z axis looking in camera.

Items.Name: Bottom View
Items.Tooltip: A view of XY plane with camera looking along Z.

Items.Name: Left View
Items.Tooltip: A view of YZ plane with camera looking along X.

Items.Name: Back View
Items.Tooltip: A view of XZ plane with Y axis looking in camera.

Items.Name: Right View
Items.Tooltip: A view of YZ plane with X axis looking in camera.

Items.Name: Isometric View
Items.Tooltip: Look at the object so the axes X,Y,Z form 120 degree angles on the view.

Items.Name: Invert View
Items.Tooltip: Rotates the camera 180 degrees around the current vertical axis.

Items.Name: Single Viewport
Items.Tooltip: Setup single viewport for the whole window.

Items.Name: Horizontal Viewports
Items.Tooltip: Setup two horizontal viewports for the whole window.

Items.Name: Vertical Viewports
Items.Tooltip: Setup two vertical viewports for the whole window.

Items.Name: Quad Viewports
Items.Tooltip: Setup four equal viewports for the whole window.

Items.Name: Add custom theme
Items.Caption: Add Custom Theme
Items.Tooltip: Customize and save the color theme.

Items.Name: Show_Hide Global Basis
Items.Caption: Toggle Global Basis
Items.Tooltip: Show or hide global 0 and X,Y,Z axes.

Items.Name: Viewer settings
Items.Caption: Settings
Items.Tooltip: Show application settings window.

Items.Name: Select objects
Items.Caption: Select Objects
Items.Tooltip: Selects objects by clicking them in the scene

Items.Name: Move object
Items.Caption: Move Object
Items.Tooltip: Move an object in a scene using a mouse

Items.Name: Ribbon Scene Sort by name
Items.Caption: Sort by Name
Items.Tooltip: Select all objects in the scene

Items.Name: Ribbon Scene Show all
Items.Caption: Show All
Items.Tooltip: Show all objects in the scene

Items.Name: Ribbon Scene Hide all
Items.Caption: Hide All
Items.Tooltip: Hide all objects in the scene

Items.Name: Ribbon Scene Select all
Items.Caption: Select All
Items.Tooltip: Select all objects in the scene

Items.Name: Ribbon Scene Unselect all
Items.Caption: Unselect All
Items.Tooltip: Select all objects in the scene

Items.Name: Ribbon Scene Show only previous
Items.Caption: Show Only Previous
Items.Tooltip: Select and show only previous

Items.Name: Ribbon Scene Show only next
Items.Caption: Show Only Next
Items.Tooltip: Select and show only next

Items.Name: Ribbon Scene Rename
Items.Caption: Rename
Items.Tooltip: Rename object

Items.Name: Ribbon Scene Remove selected objects
Items.Caption: Remove Selected
Items.Tooltip: Remove selected objects

Items.Name: Active Plugins List
Items.Caption: Active List
Items.Tooltip: Show list of active tools

Items.Name: Rotator
Items.Tooltip: Permanently rotates the scene around vertical axis.

Items.Name: Object Info
Items.Tooltip: Show information about currently selected object.
